scripts.setupdynamiclinks-dev: ionic cordova plugin remove cordova-plugin-firebase-dynamiclinks --variable PAGE_LINK_DOMAIN=devplanrecetas.page.link --variable APP_DOMAIN=dev-plan-recetas.firebaseapp.com ; ionic cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-firebase-dynamiclinks --variable PAGE_LINK_DOMAIN=devplanrecetas.page.link --variable APP_DOMAIN=dev-plan-recetas.firebaseapp.com
scripts.build:ios:dev: npm run setup-google-services-dev ; ionic cordova platform rm ios ; rm -rf plugins ; rm -rf platforms ; ionic cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-firebasex ; ionic cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-firebasex@9.1.1 && npm run setupdynamiclinks-dev && ENV=dev ionic cordova platform add ios && cd platforms/ios && pod install && pod update && cd ../.. && ENV=dev ionic cordova build ios
scripts.build:ios:prod: cp src/environments/google_services/GoogleService-Info.prod.plist GoogleService-Info.plist && cp src/environments/google_services/google-services.prod.json google-services.json && ionic cordova platform rm ios && ENV=prod ionic cordova platform add ios && ENV=prod ionic cordova build ios --prod --release
scripts.build:android:dev: npm run setup-google-services-dev && ionic cordova platform rm android ; npm run setupdynamiclinks-dev && ENV=dev ionic cordova platform add android && ENV=dev ionic cordova build android
scripts.build:android:prod: cp src/environments/google_services/GoogleService-Info.prod.plist GoogleService-Info.plist && cp src/environments/google_services/google-services.prod.json google-services.json && ionic cordova platform rm android && ENV=prod ionic cordova platform add android && ENV=prod ionic cordova build android --prod --release
scripts.deploy:functions:dev: firebase use dev-plan-recetas && firebase functions:config:set c.env=dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:prod: firebase use plan-recetas && firebase functions:config:set c.env=prod && firebase deploy --only functions
